articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Germany record-setter Musiala looking forward to facing former home England in Euro 2020 knockout stage - Goal.com
articles.description: The 10 South American countries participating in the 2021 Copa America will be split up into two groups of five. The top four in each group will advance to the single-elimination knockout stage, which kicks off with the quarterfinals.

articles.author: news24
articles.title: Senate Republicans block sweeping US voting rights measure - News24
articles.description: US Senate Republicans have torpedoed a Democratic effort to protect voting rights and expand ballot access for all Americans, a flashpoint issue.
articles.content:
• US Senate Republicans blocked the "For the People Act" from becoming law.
  • The bill was aimed at expanding rights in the US.
  • Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer labelled Repub… [+4998 chars]
